00037 #ifndef DIR_POINT_STORAGE_HEADER_INCLUDED
00038 #define DIR_POINT_STORAGE_HEADER_INCLUDED
00039 
00040 #include <point_storage.H>
00041 
00042 namespace ASCbase{
00043 
00045   template<typename _Tp, typename _Sequence = std::vector<_Tp> >
00046   class dir_point_storage : public point_storage<_Tp, _Sequence>{
00047     // Concept requirements
00048     typedef typename _Sequence::value_type _Sequence_value_type;
00049 #ifdef __GLIBCXX__
00050     __glibcxx_class_requires(_Tp, _SGIAssignableConcept);
00051     __glibcxx_class_requires(_Sequence, _BackInsertionSequenceConcept);
00052     __glibcxx_class_requires2(_Tp, _Sequence_value_type, _SameTypeConcept);
00053 #else
00054     __glibcpp_class_requires(_Tp, _SGIAssignableConcept);
00055     __glibcpp_class_requires(_Sequence, _BackInsertionSequenceConcept);
00056     __glibcpp_class_requires2(_Tp, _Sequence_value_type, _SameTypeConcept);
00057 #endif
00058 
00059     typedef point_storage<_Tp, _Sequence>               _Base;
00060 
00061   public:
00062     typedef typename _Sequence::value_type              value_type;
00063     typedef typename _Sequence::reference               reference;
00064     typedef typename _Sequence::const_reference         const_reference;
00065     typedef typename _Sequence::iterator                iterator;
00066     typedef typename _Sequence::const_iterator          const_iterator;
00067     typedef typename _Sequence::size_type               size_type;
00068     typedef          _Sequence                          container_type;
00069 
00070   protected:
00071     my_float_array directions;
00072 
00073   public:
00074     dir_point_storage(uint init_num_pts = 150, uint stride_in = 3)
00075       : _Base(init_num_pts, stride_in), directions(init_num_pts, stride_in)
00076     {
00077     }
00078 
00079     dir_point_storage(const dir_point_storage& src)
00080       : _Base(src), directions(src.directions)
00081     {
00082       do_copy(src);
00083     }
00084 
00085     const dir_point_storage&
00086     operator=(const dir_point_storage& src)
00087     {
00088       if(this != &src){
00089         _Base::operator= (src);
00090         directions = src.directions;
00091         do_copy(src);
00092       }
00093       return *this;
00094     }
00095 
00096     ~dir_point_storage()
00097     {
00098     }
00099 
00100     const my_float_t*
00101     dirs_begin() const
00102     { return directions.begin(); }
00103 
00104     const my_float_t*
00105     dirs_end() const
00106     { return directions.end(); }
00107 
00108     void 
00109     push_back(const value_type& __x)
00110     {
00111       _Base::push_back(__x);
00112       value_type& b = _Base::back();
00113       b.delete_dir();
00114       if(directions.push_back(__x.dir) == MY_FLOAT_ARRAY_GREW){
00115         my_float_t* d = directions.begin();
00116         for(iterator s = _Base::Container.begin(); 
00117             d < directions.end() && s != _Base::Container.end(); ++s){
00118           s->dir = d;
00119           d += directions.stride(); 
00120         }
00121       }else b.dir = directions.end() - directions.stride();
00122     }
00123 
00124     void 
00125     transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00126     { 
00127       const my_float_t zero[] = {0, 0, 0};
00128       directions.transform3D(R, zero); 
00129       _Base::transform(R, T); 
00130     }
00131 
00132     void 
00133     inverse_transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00134     { 
00135       const my_float_t zero[] = {0, 0, 0};
00136       directions.inverse_transform3D(R, zero); 
00137       _Base::inverse_transform(R, T); 
00138     }
00139 
00140     void 
00141     revert()
00142     { 
00143       directions.revert(); 
00144       _Base::revert();
00145     }
00146 
00147     void
00148     set_current_positions_and_directions_as_original()
00149     {
00150       directions.set_current_values_as_original();
00151       _Base::set_current_positions_as_original();
00152     }
00153 
00154 /*
00155     _Base::const_iterator
00156     corresponding_point(const my_float_t* P, const my_float_t* D)
00157     {
00158       const my_float_t* d = directions.begin();
00159       const my_float_t* p = positions.begin();
00160 
00161       my_float_t min_dist = my_float_max; 
00162       uint best_idx = 0;
00163       uint cnt = 0;
00164       my_float_t* b_pos;
00165       for(b_pos = positions.begin(); b_pos < positions.end(); b_pos += 3){
00166         my_float_t d = dist(a_pos, b_pos);
00167         if(d < min_dist){
00168           best_idx = cnt;
00169           min_dist = d;
00170         }
00171         ++cnt;
00172       }
00173       return Container.begin() + best_idx;
00174     }
00175 */
00176 
00177   private:
00178   
00179     void
00180     do_copy(const dir_point_storage& src)
00181     {
00182       my_float_t* d = directions.begin();
00183       for(iterator s = _Base::Container.begin(); 
00184           d < directions.end() && s != _Base::Container.end(); ++s){
00185         s->dir = d;
00186         d += directions.stride(); 
00187       }
00188     }
00189 
00190   };
00191 }
00192 
00193 #endif
